stages.logText: The Stoutford castle has been repaired.

Lord Berbane of Stoutford Castle has granted me the title of Junior Ambassador. As my first mission, I must bring him a sampling of drinks from across the lands. Berbane claims that this will help to revitalize Stoutford's economy somehow.
Lord Berbane also mentioned that if I find any other interesting brews, I could bring them to him as well.
I've given wine from Castle Guynmart to Lord Berbane.
I've given Blackwater brew to Lord Berbane.
I've given Brimhaven brew to Lord Berbane.
I've given Remgard rum to Lord Berbane.
